org.apache.spark.launcher

Class WorkerCommandBuilder

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.launcher.WorkerCommandBuilder

  • public class WorkerCommandBuilder
extends Object
    This class is used by CommandUtils. It uses some package-private APIs in SparkLauncher, and since Java doesn't have a feature similar to private[spark], and we don't want that class to be public, needs to live in the same package as the rest of the library.

    • Method Detail

      • buildCommand

        public java.util.List<String> buildCommand(java.util.Map<String,String> env)
        Builds the command to execute.
        Parameters:
        env - A map containing environment variables for the child process. It may already contain entries defined by the user (such as SPARK_HOME, or those defined by the SparkLauncher constructor that takes an environment), and may be modified to include other variables needed by the process to be executed.
